privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.content:
At Trading Moon, accessible from www.tradingmoon.in, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that are collected and recorded by Trading Moon and how we use it.

1. Information We Collect

When you visit our website, we may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us, including but not limited to your name, email address, and any message you send through the contact form. We may also collect information automatically as you navigate through the website, such as IP address, browser type, pages visited, and time spent on our website.

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to provide and maintain our website, improve user experience, respond to your messages, and display personalized advertisements through Google AdSense.

3. Cookies and Tracking Technologies

Trading Moon uses cookies to enhance user experience and for tracking purposes. Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit a website. We use cookies to understand and save your preferences, keep track of advertisements, and compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interactions.

4. Google AdSense and Third-Party Cookies

We may use Google AdSense to serve ads on our website. Google, as a third-party vendor, uses cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website or other websites. Users may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google Ad Settings.

5. Data Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties, except as necessary to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect our rights and safety.

6. Data Security

We take the security of your personal data seriously, using industry-standard methods to protect it. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

7. Your Data Rights

You may have certain rights under data protection laws, such as accessing, correcting, or deleting your personal data. Contact us at support@tradingmoon.in to exercise these rights.

8. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time, and we encourage you to review it periodically.

cookie-consent.title: Cookie Consent
cookie-consent.content:
This website, Trading Moon, uses cookies to enhance the user experience and to provide personalized content and advertising. By using our website, you agree to the use of cookies as outlined in this Cookie Policy.

1. What Are Cookies?

Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit websites. They are used to remember your preferences and actions, such as login information.

2. How We Use Cookies

We use cookies for various purposes, including essential cookies for website functionality, analytics cookies for improving performance, and advertising cookies for personalized ads.

3. Third-Party Cookies

We allow third-party services, such as Google AdSense, to place cookies on your device to serve relevant ads. These cookies are subject to the privacy policies of those third parties.

4. Managing Cookies

You can manage cookies through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect your experience on this website.

5. Consent to Use Cookies

By continuing to use our website, you consent to the use of cookies.

Why Trading Moon?
